course_description: Introduction to statistical analysis for managerial decision making. Introduces methods of data description, statistical inference, statistical modeling, and statistical decision theory. Methods applied to practical business problems.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the Emory College Liberal Arts and Sciences program or Undergraduate Oxford program.
